articles.author: Lisalee Solomons
articles.title: FEEL GOOD | R6k tip for R453 bill! 'It's my birthday month, I’m going to spoil myself' - Cape waitress - News24
articles.description: Cape Town waitress Violet Musanandara was left "speechless" after the customer she had served on Friday night at Simply Asia in Durbanville left a R6 000 tip for her to split with her colleagues.
articles.content:
• The customer told her he did not make a mistake with the payment and that she should "split it amongst her 12 colleagues".
  • The restaurant manager said they all screamed after the paym… [+3704 chars]

articles.title: Japan, ASEAN agree on importance of free navigation in South China Sea - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: The foreign ministers of Japan and the Association of Southeast Asian Nations agreed Tuesday on the importance of freedom of navigation in the South China Sea, where China has conflicting territorial claims with some of the 10-member bloc.
